snippet.title: Drop Off Donations — Housing Works
snippet.description: Donations of usable and resalable items in excellent condition such as women's and men's clothing are essential to keep our doors open. We also welcome jewelry, accessories, ... Broadway between 96th & 97th streets. New York, NY 10025
